\ Standup Timer is a simple application that can be used to keep your stand-up meetings on track. It is free and open source.

\ General 

\ Simply specify the number of participants and the meeting length, and press Start to get started. On the timer screen, press Next to restart the timer for a new meeting participant, or Finish to stop the timer and end the meeting. 

\ Teams 

\ Standup Timer can be configured to keep track of stand-up meetings for one or more teams. Keeping track of meetings for teams allows you to see average statistics (average meeting length, average individual status length, etc) for a given team. You are also able to see the detailed statistics for each meeting that team has held. 

\ Creating a team 

\ To create a new team, select the Teams option from the main menu. On the Teams screen, select the Add option from the menu to add a new team. 

\ Specifying a team when starting a timer 

\ Once a team has been created, you will be able to select that team from the Team drop down menu when starting a new meeting timer. When the meeting is finished, statistics for that meeting will be written to the database. 

\ Average meeting statistics for a team 

\ To access the statistics for a particular team, select the Teams option from the main menu, and select the team you wish to see statistics for. The Stats tab will show you the average statistics for that team. The Meetings tab will show you the list of meetings that team has held. 

\ Statistics for a specific meeting 

\ To see details about a specific meeting, select the meeting from the list of meetings in the Meetings tab for a given team.
